articles.title: India vs Australia Football: When and Where To Watch AFC Asian Cup 2024 Match - The Quint
articles.description: India will face the Australian team for the AFC Asian Cup 2024 match on Saturday, 13 January 2024. Check the date, time, venue, and details about live telecast in India.
articles.content:
When is the AFC Asian Cup match between India vs Australia taking place?
